column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachel - Thanks for your review. I appreciate your comments
column2: though I think it's important I point out that we offer two more spice levels beyond "Hot
column3: which are Inferno" and "Double Inferno." These are "off-menu" modifications that were borne out of numerous customers' requests to make their broth spicier. I'm sorry we didn't meet your standards for ramen
column5: but I do appreciate your acknowledging our good service and ambience. But above all
column6: I appreciate your giving us a try
column7: and hopefully some of the folks you dined with thought differently!
